Projects

Chat User Screen

This portfolio project demonstrates a chat screen UI application created with React and TypeScript. The user interface presents conversations with clickable hyperlink buttons in the reply section, facilitating a seamless navigation experience. Moreover, it functions as a Progressive Web App (PWA), ensuring accessibility and responsiveness across various devices.

See Live Source Code

Shopping Site

This React-based e-commerce project showcases core React concepts, emphasizing a seamless integration with a fake store API for realistic e-commerce functionalities. It highlights the practical application of React in crafting dynamic and responsive web experiences.

See Live Source Code

To Do App

This project is a straightforward yet functional to-do application developed using a combination of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The user interface is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly, allowing users to efficiently manage and organize their tasks.
